name: Visit the Gobustan Rock Art Cultural Landscape
description: Explore ancient petroglyphs and mud volcanoes in Gobustan, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Flame Towers View
description: Admire the iconic Flame Towers, a symbol of modern Baku, with stunning architecture and lighting.

name: Old City (Icherisheher) Exploration
description: Walk through the ancient streets of Baku's Old City, a UNESCO site with rich history and culture.

name: Sheki Khan's Palace Visit
description: Visit the magnificent Sheki Khan's Palace, famous for its intricate designs and stained glass work.

name: Caspian Sea Cruise
description: Enjoy a scenic cruise on the Caspian Sea, offering beautiful views and a relaxing experience.

name: Carpet Museum Tour
description: Discover Azerbaijan's rich weaving history at the Carpet Museum in Baku.

name: Yanar Dag (Burning Mountain)
description: Witness the mesmerizing natural flames of Yanar Dag, a mountain that has been burning for centuries.

name: Mud Volcanoes Visit
description: Explore Azerbaijan's unique and bizarre mud volcanoes, a rare natural phenomenon.

name: Azerbaijan National Museum of History
description: Immerse in Azerbaijan's rich history and culture at the National Museum in Baku.

name: Quba & Khinalug Village Tour
description: Discover the remote and picturesque village of Khinalug, nestled in the Caucasus Mountains near Quba.
